features.title: Features
features.description: Discover the amazing features of PlanzUp.

feature1.title: Automated Booking ü™Ñ
feature1.description: Slots will be picked according to the schedule of both the masters and the clients.

feature2.title: Marketplace for Masters üõçÔ∏è
feature2.description: Masters will be showcased in a marketplace format, allowing more people to see their offers.

feature3.title: Reminders Customization üîî
feature3.description: Clients can choose when and how to be reminded of their sessions.

feature4.title: Recommendation System ‚≠ê
feature4.description: The system adapts to the consumer's time preferences, offering suggestions for both masters and specific slots.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.description: See the advantages of using PlanzUp.

benefit1.title: Efficient Scheduling
benefit1.description: Reduces the management load on masters and salon managers.

benefit2.title: Better Time Utilization
benefit2.description: Balances the working hours of specialists.

benefit3.title: Improved Client Communication
benefit3.description: Facilitates clear service demonstrations and fast response to booking inquiries.

benefit4.title: Smart Recommendations
benefit4.description: Provides time slot and master recommendations based on user preferences.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Our revenue is planned through a subscription fee of 2000 rubles, on average, depending on the size of the enterprise. Additional revenue can be obtained from subscriptions paid by salons for their special clients.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Explore our market potential and customer insights

team.title: Team
team.description: Meet the dedicated team behind PlanzUp.
